NK036(chi)031:1: // rin po che 'od gsal rang grol gyi rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)031:2: de ltar ngo mtshar mchog gis brgyan pa /
NK036(chi)031:3: phyam brdal rdzogs pa chen po'i ngang las skad cig
NK036(chi)031:4: g.yel ba med cing pad+mo rgyas par mdzad pa'i bla
NK036(chi)031:5: ma dam pa / sna tshogs rang grol chen po de nyid la /
NK036(chi)031:6: kho bos 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i don rnams phyin ci ma log par zhus te /
NK036(chi)031:8: lus ngag yid gsum gyis ci mnyes su bsgrubs te /
NK036(chi)031:9: de'ang kho bo'i yul ni g.yu ru gzhung 'be zhes bya bar /
NK036(chi)031:10: yab dpal mgon dar zhes bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)031:11: yum se mo zhes bya ba'i sras su 'khrungs te /
NK036(chi)031:12: chung ngu'i dus nas dad pa dang /
NK036(chi)031:13: nges 'byung skyo shas drag po thun mong ma yin pa skye ba zhig yod cing /
NK036(chi)031:14: lo dgu lon pa'i dus su /
NK036(chi)031:15: a ne zhig gi go na bsdad pa'i dus su /
NK036(chi)031:16: bya bral ba khyi lpags sked la dkris pa gcig /
NK036(chi)031:19: bla ma la gsol ba 'debs zer ba zhig mthong ba tsam gyis nges 'byung skyes pas /
NK036(chi)031:20: nga phyags phyir 'khrid par zhu zhus nas /
NK036(chi)031:21: zla shas kyi bar phyi la 'brangs te /
NK036(chi)031:22: thugs rje chen po dpal mo lugs kyi skor rnams zhus nas yig drug bgrangs pas /
NK036(chi)031:23: nyams sam rmi lam gyi snang ba la byin gyis rlabs snyam byed pa byung dus /
NK036(chi)031:25: snying rje'i snang ba dpag tu med pa skyes /
NK036(chi)031:27: bla ma bsod nams rgyal mtshan pa la dge bsnyen dang yongs rdzogs zhus zhing /
NK036(chi)031:28: phyag na rdo rje gtum po /
NK036(chi)031:30: bde mchog lhan skyes rnams zhus nas bsnyen pa cung zad byas pas rtags rnams mtshon pa byung /
NK036(chi)031:31: de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga na zul phur phyin te /
NK036(chi)031:32: mkhan chen zul phu ba dang /
NK036(chi)031:33: slob dpon sh+aakya don grub gnyis las dge slong chig rdzogs zhus nas /
NK036(chi)031:34: slob dpon sh+aakya don grub las 'dul ba gzhi stod bslabs /
NK036(chi)031:35: bla ma dam pa sh+aakya shes rab las lhan cig skyes sbyor /
NK036(chi)031:38: mi la'i gtum mo gzhung khrid /
NK036(chi)031:40: bde mchog lha bcu gsum ma /
NK036(chi)031:42: dmus long sbas pa mig 'byed kyi dbang rnams zhus nas /
NK036(chi)031:43: zang zing gi yon 'bul rgyu med pas /
NK036(chi)031:44: zla ba bdun gyi bar du sgrub pa'i mchod pa phul nas bsgoms pas /
NK036(chi)031:45: sems spros bral kyi ngo bo mthong zhing /
NK036(chi)031:46: bla ma shin tu mnyes nas khyod kyis sems can
NK036(chi)031:47: la phan thogs pa zhig 'ong bar 'dug gsung ste
NK036(chi)031:50: bcud len than thun la brten cing /
NK036(chi)031:51: gos kyang khyi lpags re dang ber po gcig la brten nas sgrub pa snying por byas shing /
NK036(chi)031:52: bla ma dam pa lha sar 'byon pa'i phyag phyi la phyin te /
NK036(chi)031:53: chu 'thung zhus te chu dbyar gcig 'thungs pas snying
NK036(chi)031:54: rus che gsung nas shin tu thugs rjes bzung ste
NK036(chi)031:55: / dad pa thun mong ma yin pa skyes pas /
NK036(chi)031:56: bla ma sprul pa'i sku 'dug snyam nas gsol ba btab pa /
NK036(chi)031:57: kye kye mgon po sprul pa'i sku //
NK036(chi)031:58: bdag sogs rigs drug sems can rnams //
NK036(chi)031:59: thog mtha' med pa'i dus nyid du //
NK036(chi)031:61: bzod med sdug bsngal chas kyis brgyan //
NK036(chi)031:62: thar med yun ring mnar ba la //
NK036(chi)031:63: thugs rje'i lcags kyus drang du gsol //
NK036(chi)031:64: chu bzang du bla ma dam pa grags pa bshes gnyen pa la /
NK036(chi)031:65: rdzogs chen bla ma gzhungs sa nas brgyud pa ni gu chos drug /
NK036(chi)031:67: mkha' spyod kyi skor rnams zhus /
NK036(chi)031:68: tshe 'di'i dbang du ma gyur tsam pa'i 'dun pa byas shing /
NK036(chi)031:69: srin po ri ru slob dpon grags pa shes rab las phar phyin /
NK036(chi)031:72: sa skya pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa /
NK036(chi)031:73: chos skyong seng nag rnams zhus /
NK036(chi)031:74: kun rig gzhan phan rnam gzig rnams bslabs shing lus
NK036(chi)031:75: ngag yid gsum sel med kyi sgo nas mos gus
NK036(chi)031:76: rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa phul /
NK036(chi)031:77: bye rdzing pa'i mkhan po bsod she'i drung du ston pa'i lugs kyi sbyor drug lung thob tsam dang /
NK036(chi)031:78: sgrol ma bcu bdun ma'i dbang las kha tshar dang bcas pa /
NK036(chi)031:79: sman bla'i mdo chog rnams 'joms dpa' bo gcig pa /
NK036(chi)031:80: sme brtsegs rnams zhus shing thugs rjes shin tu 'dzin par mdzad /
NK036(chi)031:81: mkhan po a dge ba las bka' gdams lam rim /
NK036(chi)031:82: blo sbyong gi dbang zhi byed rma sogs kam gsum rnams dang /
NK036(chi)031:83: mgon po a g+ho ra'i rjes gnang dang bcas pa zhus /
NK036(chi)031:84: lho brag shar du phyin te /
NK036(chi)031:85: chos rje rgod tshang pa'i skye ba bla ma na lung pa'i drung du /
NK036(chi)031:86: rgod tshang pa'i lhan cig skyes sbyor /
NK036(chi)031:88: rten 'brel snying po rnams zhus nas zla ba bdun du nyams len rtse gcig tu byas te /
NK036(chi)031:89: 'tsho ba yang skyo tsha phor re las med pa la gsol ba kho na btab cing /
NK036(chi)031:90: tshe 'di'i 'dun pa thongs par bya snyam pa'i zhes bcad drag tu skyes /
NK036(chi)031:91: lho brag mkhar chur gnas skor la phyin te /
NK036(chi)031:92: bla ma 'ga' zhig gi drung du chos 'brel tsam zhus /
NK036(chi)031:93: lha mo nang du bla ma lha mo mkhar ba
NK036(chi)031:94: bya ba dgung lo brgyad cu rtsa lhag bzhes pa'i
NK036(chi)031:95: drung du / zla ba lnga bsdad nas zhi byed so skor dang /
NK036(chi)031:96: gzhan yang phan bya'i skor mang du zhus /
NK036(chi)031:97: 'tsho ba yang rtag tu ngu'i ril bu tsho gcig la brten cing yul phyogs su mi log par /
NK036(chi)031:98: bla ma'i drung 'di nyid du nyams len kho na la brtson par byed la /
NK036(chi)031:99: tshe 'di'i 'dun ma la don med snyam pa rgyud la skyes shing /
NK036(chi)031:100: lhan cig 'dzom pa'i sgyu lus 'di yang nam bor cha med par 'dug snyam pa dang /
NK036(chi)031:101: gnyen nye du'i brtse gdung la yang rgyab kyis phyogs
NK036(chi)031:102: pa'i 'dun pa skyes shing gro bo lung du gnas
NK036(chi)031:104: mar pa'i gdan sa bla ma dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dang mjal /
NK036(chi)031:105: n+aa ro'i chos drug zhus nas /
NK036(chi)031:106: mi la phug pa zla ba lnga tsam bsgoms shing /
NK036(chi)031:107: chos drug gi rtags dum pa byung bas /
NK036(chi)031:108: bla ma mnyes nas lha khang gsar pa'i dgon gzhi dang bcas khyod la ster ba yin /
NK036(chi)031:109: gdan sa byed dgos gsung pa nan cher mdzad /
NK036(chi)031:110: bdag 'dra'i sprang po 'khyams pos gong ma'i gdan sa
NK036(chi)031:111: mi yong lags pas bka' bkyon mi gnang ba zhu
NK036(chi)031:112: zhus pas / khyod dge sbyor la blo 'gro bar
NK036(chi)031:113: 'dug pa 'di la dka' las ci yang med par
NK036(chi)031:114: zhus pas / gyis gsung kyang / bka' gcog par mi 'os na'ang /
NK036(chi)031:115: sku drin la dge sbyor ci nus byed par zhu zhus nas mi la phug par bsdad dus /
NK036(chi)031:116: bya bral ba gnas skor la byung ba zhig dang 'phrad /
NK036(chi)031:117: ts+aa ri'i lam yig rim pa gnyis tsam kho bo'i lag na 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)031:118: de rnams la ltad mo byas dus /
NK036(chi)031:119: ts+aa ri'i che ba'i yon tan dang basngagasa pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)031:121: tshe 'di blos btang nas ci nas kyang ts+aa ri
NK036(chi)031:122: la 'gro snyam pa'i 'dun pa drag po skyes shing
NK036(chi)031:123: / de yang ts+aa r+ai'i gnas sgo lha sa nas
NK036(chi)031:124: 'byed dgos bcu gcig zhal gyi drung du gsol ba
NK036(chi)031:126: lha sar phyin te dkor gnyer la zhu ba byas nas gsol ba zhag 'ga' btab dus /
NK036(chi)031:127: rmi lam du mi dkar po shel gyi mdog lta
NK036(chi)031:128: bu gcig gis bdud rtsi'i ril bu yin zer ba
NK036(chi)031:130: lus ngag yid gsum bde ba snyam byed cing /
NK036(chi)031:131: gnyid sad pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba'i bde
NK036(chi)031:132: gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams zhag gnyis kyi bar du
NK036(chi)031:133: byung zhing / de dus su skor ba dang gsol ba 'degs pa zhag 'ga' byas dus /
NK036(chi)031:134: la stod rdor gling pa ts+aa rir 'byon pa dpon
NK036(chi)031:135: slob sum cu skor byung ba dang bsdongs nas phyin
NK036(chi)031:136: dus ts+aa ri rnying mar slebs te /
NK036(chi)031:137: dgyer sgom zhig pos btab pa'i gnas rdza khrod nub bya bar bsdad nas /
NK036(chi)031:138: g.yu mtsho bskor zhing lus ngal la stobs med par gyur kyang /
NK036(chi)031:139: mar rgan byas na sgrib pa 'dags pa'i stobs che zer bas mar rgan byas dus /
NK036(chi)031:140: 'khos ka chung bas lus ngag la skyo dub cher byung yang bzod pa byas shing /
NK036(chi)031:141: mos gus dang dag pa'i snang bas mched grogs rnams mnyes par byas pas /
NK036(chi)031:142: mthong snang la sogs rab rib gsal ba rnams kyang
NK036(chi)031:143: rang sems dag pa'i rten 'a brel kho nar 'dug
NK036(chi)031:144: snyam pa dang / re gong pa'i dbu mdzad bzang po gcig la ni gu chos drug dang /
NK036(chi)031:145: bla ma mgon po dbyer med /
NK036(chi)031:146: byin rlabs can gyi n+aa ro ba'i rgyan drug thod
NK036(chi)031:147: pa mtshan ldan rnams a pho rdor 'dzin la g.yar
NK036(chi)031:148: po zhus te / bka' dang bcas pa rdzogs par zhus nas nyams su blangs pas /
NK036(chi)031:149: mi rgod gtum mo sgom dus ras thub tsam byung la /
NK036(chi)031:150: sgyu lus bden med khong du chud //
NK036(chi)031:151: rmi lam 'dun pa'i yid dang bral //
NK036(chi)031:152: bar do'i zhing khams mngon du 'gyur //
NK036(chi)031:154: 'gro drug skye sgo chod dam snyam //
NK036(chi)031:155: nges pa'i shes pa gting nas skyes //
NK036(chi)031:156: de dus lo gsum gyi dam bca' byas /
NK036(chi)031:157: lung phran na bzhugs pa'i bla ma 'ga' zhig las chos 'brel zhus shing /
NK036(chi)031:158: lo gsum bsdad dus la bar skas mgo bya ba na /
NK036(chi)031:159: yon bdag mo dad pa can rdor rgyan bya ba zhig gis /
NK036(chi)031:160: rta rgod ma gcig phul ba la brten te /
NK036(chi)031:161: lag na yod pa'i gtor cha dang chas rnams grogs mched gcig la 'tshong du bcug nas /
NK036(chi)031:162: ts+aa ri ras pa brgyad brgya la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrubs nas /
NK036(chi)031:164: zang zing rnams don yod par byas te /
NK036(chi)031:165: lung phran 'ga' zhig tu chu 'thung zhing sgrub pa byas pas /
NK036(chi)031:166: gegs chen po byung nas chu dang khar ma byung bar /
NK036(chi)031:167: lus kyi nyams stobs rnams bri /
NK036(chi)031:168: lta ba'i mig 'bras kyang khong du rdib cing yas
NK036(chi)031:169: bcibs mas bcibs gnyis la 'jag ma'i ka ba btsugs
NK036(chi)031:170: te phyes / smra ba'i lce yang mi 'gyur ba la /
NK036(chi)031:171: lus rgud rtsib ma rgyu mal zug /
NK036(chi)031:172: de dus bems rig bral bar gyur kyang 'gyod med ngang la nyal nas bsdad /
NK036(chi)031:173: zhag bdun lon nas gegs sel te /
NK036(chi)031:175: chu sgra thos dus bcud rnams lon pa snyam /
NK036(chi)031:176: lus kyang shing bal lta bur yang /
NK036(chi)031:177: ming yang bla ma chu par grags /
NK036(chi)031:178: de nas bzung ste grogs mched rnams la chu 'thung gi lung dang /
NK036(chi)031:179: sba bzhi'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa mang du bstan
NK036(chi)031:180: te phan pa 'ga' re tsam gyis mnyes par byas
NK036(chi)031:181: so // gnas bzang po 'dir sgyu lus ma bor
NK036(chi)031:182: ba la dge sbyor kho na la brtson pa cher
NK036(chi)031:184: bla ma kha rag pa bya ba chos 'bel yod pa zhig gi gsung nas /
NK036(chi)031:185: cis kyang yar phyogs la phyin pa 'thad pas 'dongs gsung nas stod phyogs la 'ong shing /
NK036(chi)031:186: chu bo rir bla ma sh+aakya shes rab sku gshegs pa'i pur dang mjal tsam gcig byung /
NK036(chi)031:187: de dus bka' drin dran pas gdung gi drung du
NK036(chi)031:188: zhag bcu gcig gi bar la gsol ba 'debs kyin
NK036(chi)031:189: bsdad pas / nges 'byung dang skyoo shes drag po gcig skyes te /
NK036(chi)031:191: lho mon sogs dge sbyor 'phel ba /
NK036(chi)031:192: dka' thub dang bcud len gyis rdzas mang la chu bzang sa gcig tu 'gro dgos bsam tsa na /
NK036(chi)031:193: grogs mched mang po zhig lho mon la 'byon zer bas /
NK036(chi)031:194: de rnams dang lhan cig tu zang zing cha ci yod rnams lhan du za la /
NK036(chi)031:195: dge sbyor yang mnyam du byed cing skyid sdug ci
NK036(chi)031:196: byung bsre ba yin zer ba kha 'cham du byas
NK036(chi)031:198: mon khar slebs dus sgrub pa rtse gcig tu byed pa'i 'dun pa dang cung zad bral te /
NK036(chi)031:199: grogs mched la la dngos po kho na'i ched du song /
NK036(chi)031:200: re zhig chos 'don dang rim gro 'dra byed du song ste /
NK036(chi)031:201: dgun lo der nga rang gcig pus bum thang rgya
NK036(chi)031:202: le mkhar bya ba'i brag la sgrub pa kho na
NK036(chi)031:203: byed kyin bsdad / de nas mon nub phyogs snga
NK036(chi)031:204: long bya bar phyin pas nags dad pa rnams na
NK036(chi)031:205: byed kyin bsdad / re / bla ma gu ru bzang po yin zer bas /
NK036(chi)031:207: de'i dus gson po'i dge ba 'bul ba la /
NK036(chi)031:211: 'bras la sogs pa mang po 'byung zhing /
NK036(chi)031:212: bla ma dam pa kun mkhyen pa bum thang du
NK036(chi)031:213: phebs zer ba'i snyan grags che ba la brten te
NK036(chi)031:214: / mjal du 'gro bsam pa'i 'dun pa skyes pa la /
NK036(chi)031:215: mon yul nub phyogs pa rnams kyis bsod nams dang dge ba yang 'phel du bsgyur ba dang /
NK036(chi)031:216: bdag gi dad pa'i gdung shugs ma log pa la brten nas /
NK036(chi)031:218: yul de na 'khrug pa chen po yod cing /
NK036(chi)031:219: mi spyod shin tu rtsub pa las med na'ang /
NK036(chi)031:220: chos rje'i drung du mjal du phyin pas /
NK036(chi)031:221: chos rje'i gsung gis yul khams 'di na g.yul ngo drag po yod dam gsung /
NK036(chi)031:222: nang 'khrug byed cing gda' lags zhus shing /
NK036(chi)031:223: nged kyi tshes bcu gcig gi nyin 'degs pas /
NK036(chi)031:224: thugs rjes 'dzin par zhu zhus pas /
NK036(chi)031:225: yul khams na 'khrug longs chen po 'dug pas /
NK036(chi)031:226: mi mang po 'dus nas 'khrug rtsod 'byung dogs yod
NK036(chi)031:227: gsung pas nged kyi grong dbon rnams kyi sar phyin
NK036(chi)031:228: nas 'khrug pa mi yong ba'i gnya' byed lags /
NK036(chi)031:229: khong rang rnams la yang 'bul ba ci yod khyer
NK036(chi)031:230: shog zer ba byas pas chog lags zer ba zhus
NK036(chi)031:231: te / gong bzhin du mi rnams la gnya' khrigs
NK036(chi)031:232: rnams byas nas 'dams lha khang bya ba'i nag chen
NK036(chi)031:233: po gcig tu tshes bcu mdzad de /
NK036(chi)031:234: de'i zhabs tog rnams bsgrubs shing /
NK036(chi)031:235: 'khor gsum yongs dag gi spyad pa rnams phul nas dgyes par mdzad do //
NK036(chi)031:236: yul khams de'i mi skye pho mo ma lus pa
NK036(chi)031:237: 'dus pas 'bul ba rta dang gser g.yu dar ras
NK036(chi)031:238: 'bras nas la sogs dpag tu med pa phul /
NK036(chi)031:240: 'gro ba rnams thar pa'i sa la 'god par mdzad /
NK036(chi)031:241: de'i dus nged kyi phyi la 'dongs gsung nas /
NK036(chi)031:242: mon men log kun bzang gling du phebs dus snying thig gi khrid gsungs te /
NK036(chi)031:243: khrid pa shin tu gang gcig gi spros bcas kyi dbang bzhi byas /
NK036(chi)031:244: khrid rjes gnang dang bcas pa thugs la btags te gnang /
NK036(chi)031:245: o rgyan gling bya ba'i dgon chung gcig chos rjes
NK036(chi)031:246: btab nas 'dir sdod gsungs pas bka' ma chog par
NK036(chi)031:247: lo gcig gi bar la bsdad /
NK036(chi)031:248: bum thang du gshegs dus 'dir yang bsdad par mi 'thad par 'dug 'dongs gsungs pas /
NK036(chi)031:249: de nas bzung nas phyags phyir 'brengs shing lus ngag
NK036(chi)031:250: gi zhabs tog rang sems kyis ma khrel bar bsgrubs
NK036(chi)031:251: shing / bod kyi gdan 'dren rim par byung bas /
NK036(chi)031:252: bod la phyags 'debs pa'i phyags phyi la lus dang grib ma bzhin du byas te /
NK036(chi)031:253: dbang khrid kyi gdams pa bcas pa zab pa dang
NK036(chi)031:254: rgya che ba'i man ngag spyi dang bye brag tu
NK036(chi)031:255: gyur pa rnams rdzogs par gnang ste /
NK036(chi)031:257: zhwa pad+ma dbang chen gyi gtsug lag khang la dkar
NK036(chi)031:258: mo cod pan la sogs kyi mchod pas mnyes par
NK036(chi)031:259: mdzad / de dus snyun gzhi dum gcig byung ba brten nas /
NK036(chi)031:260: zhal chems la sogs pa'i yig rigs sogs kyang mdzad de /
NK036(chi)031:261: mchims phur 'gro gsung ba la ston so mchims phur phyags phebs /
NK036(chi)031:262: khrid pa shin tu mang ba gcig 'a dzom ste khrid kyi sgang la song dus /
NK036(chi)031:263: chos rje nyid gdod ma'i dbyings su sku 'pho ba'i tshul bstan te /
NK036(chi)031:265: khrid 'phro la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK036(chi)031:267: zla ba byung ngo cog gi dus su mchod pa dang bcas pa bsgrubs shing /
NK036(chi)031:268: mchims phu rin po che'i gnas de nyid du /
NK036(chi)031:269: ri mi'i 'beb dam bcas te sgrub pa'i mchod pas bla ma mnyes par bya snyam pa la /
NK036(chi)031:270: bla ma de nyid kyi phrin las rnam par dag pa dang /
NK036(chi)031:271: sngon gyi las smon dag pa'i 'phen pas /
NK036(chi)031:272: res 'ga' chos rje'i phyag srol gzhan don la dmigs
NK036(chi)031:273: te don gnyer gyi slob ma rnams la khrid ka
NK036(chi)031:274: re tsam bstan / res 'ga' rang don gyi sgrub pa lo re tsam yang byas la /
NK036(chi)031:275: bar skabs rnams su yang sos dal dang le lor ma bsdad par /
NK036(chi)031:276: chos kyi rje rgyal mtshan dam pa 'khon sa skya
NK036(chi)031:277: pa 'gro ba'i mgon po bsod nams rgyal mtshan pa'i
NK036(chi)031:278: drung du / dus 'khor sbyor drug gnyis /
NK036(chi)031:283: gshed dmar lha lnga ma'i rdzogs rim spros med kyi khrid /
NK036(chi)031:284: lha bcu gsum ma'i rdzogs rim /
NK036(chi)031:286: bla ma sh+aakya rat+na las sbyor drug ston pa lugs /
NK036(chi)031:288: n+aa ro mkha' spyod kyi rjes gnang dang bcas pa /
NK036(chi)031:290: mkha' 'gro snying tig gu ru tshe brtan gyi skor /
NK036(chi)031:291: bla ma blo gros pa las sel dang bcas /
NK036(chi)031:296: phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i bka' bskyed rdzogs dang bcas pa /
NK036(chi)031:297: gshed dmar lha lnga ma'i bka' /
NK036(chi)031:299: rnam sras rta brgyad ma'i bka' rjes gnang dang bcas pa zhus /
NK036(chi)031:300: de ltar lus ngag yid gsum la rang don gyi 'khris med par byas te /
NK036(chi)031:301: ngam shod lho byang sa cha stod smadakyi dad pa
NK036(chi)031:302: cung zad thob pa rnams thar pa'i lam sna tsam
NK036(chi)031:303: la bkod cing / zang zing gi dngos po than
NK036(chi)031:304: thun byung ba rnams rang gzhan tshogs bsags par bya
NK036(chi)031:305: la bkod cing / ba'i ched du / jo bo mched gnyis kyi thog drangs pas /
NK036(chi)031:306: sku gsung thugs kyi rten lha sa /
NK036(chi)031:307: bsam yas na bzhugs pa rnams la gser chab dkar me cod pan /
NK036(chi)031:308: bsam yas sde dgon na bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun chos
NK036(chi)031:309: byed kyi rigs su gyur ba rnams la tshogs 'khor
NK036(chi)031:310: 'bul nod la sogs pa bsgrubs shing /
NK036(chi)031:311: mdor na nad kyis gtses pa'i nyam thag pa gcig
NK036(chi)031:312: yan chad la phan pa'i bsam pas zin par byas
NK036(chi)031:313: te / dad mos kyi sa la 'khod pa tsam
NK036(chi)031:314: du byas pa la bdag ma gtogs pa'i bla ma
NK036(chi)031:315: gong ma rnams ni rig 'dzin gyi bla ma dngos
NK036(chi)031:317: bdag lta bu'i gang zag gis rjes su dpag par mi nus kyang /
NK036(chi)031:318: bshes gnyen dam pa shes rab rgya mtsho yis //
NK036(chi)031:319: gus pa'i tshul gyis yang yang bskul ba'i ngor //
NK036(chi)031:320: bsam yas mchims phur dpal gyi ri khrod du //
NK036(chi)031:321: spro ba'i sems kyis mdo tsam brjod pa la //
NK036(chi)031:322: nongs pa mchis na mkhas rnams bzod par gsol //
NK036(chi)031:323: dge ba de yis mkha' khyab 'gro ba kun //
NK036(chi)031:324: zab yang rdo rje'i rtse mor rab phyin te //
NK036(chi)031:325: gdod ma'i sa la gtan srid zin par shog /
NK036(chi)031:326: bla ma dam pa 'od gsal rang grol gyi rnam par thar pa mdor bsdus pa //
